conclusion: Analyze forces on pillow-child system and ball using equilibrium and Newton's second law.
Pillow-child system has zero net force due to constant velocity.
Forces on pillow-child: gravitational force, tension in rope, horizontal and vertical tension components.
Vertical force components balance: \( F_{\text{拉}} \sin \beta = (m_1 + m_2)g \).
Ball is in equilibrium; analyze forces on ball.
Forces on ball: gravitational force, tension in rope.
Vertical equilibrium for ball: \( F_{\text{拉}} \cos \beta = m_1 g \).
Substitute tension to find: \( \frac{(m_1 + m_2) \cos \beta}{\sin \beta} = m_1 \).
Determine ratio of tension to force exerted by pillow: \( \frac{1}{\sin \beta \sin \alpha} \).
